title: (x) Heydays, Tinn Sparebank, thin slab-serif typeface - Bodoni Egyptian {Florian}
content:
I'm having trouble identifying this beautiful serif used by the always-inspiring [Heydays](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162012/http:/heydays.info/) for a book design. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Heydays_TinnSparebank1_3701.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Heydays_TinnSparebank2_3557.jpg)
author: Elliott Walker

comments.content:
Hi Elliott,

could this be [Nick Shinn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162012/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nick%20Shinn)’s [Bodoni Egyptian Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162012/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/bodoni-egyptian/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DSTYRE%2520OG%2520FORST%25201859%25E2%2580%25942009%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D29)?  
F
Thanks, Florian! That looks right to me.
